name: Eggard
overview: Eggard is a unique game with some elements of Qix and Pac-man. You are given a maze of tunnels with one entrance at the top and eggs places in various locations. Eggard can move his tongue through the maze, looking for the tasty eggs. However as he does this there is a creature roaming the maze who will cost Eggard a life by touching any part of his tongue. After retrieving all the eggs, Eggard has to fully retract his tongue and can then move on to the next level.
